entry.title: Grants and upcoming research
entry.content:
Open full post for hyperlinks. There are a lot of exciting, upcoming things in the lab! In the last couple months, Evan has had a few proposals funded, including

  • a NASA project looking at using AI to detect tree flowering phenology
  • a major project from NSF that will investigate mortality of large tropical trees. See an overview of the project in a recent Cary news brief.

Stay tuned for some exciting things in the near future!
entry.summary: Open full post for hyperlinks. There are a lot of exciting, upcoming things in the lab! In the last couple months, Evan has had a few proposals funded, including a NASA project looking at using AI to detect tree flowering phenology a major project from NSF that will investigate mortality of large tropical trees. See an overview of the project in a recent Cary news brief.

entry.title: New Assistant Scientist!
entry.content: Open full post for hyperlinks. Congratulations to Evan for his onboarding as a new Assistant Scientist at Cary Institute! Check out his new staff page on the Cary website.
